hobbies: running, playing guitar, and volunteering at his church
goals: to grow his business, to save for retirement, and to give back to his community
challenges: to compete with larger businesses, to balance work and family life, and to find affordable health insurance
motivations: to be his own boss, to provide for his family, and to help others
fears: to go bankrupt, to lose his family, and to get sick without access to healthcare
